item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, June 8, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Danish prime minister assaulted in central Copenhagen square
2. PwC asks for silence from departing staff in programme of UK job cuts
3. Sunak handed gift to Reform with D-Day exit, say senior Tories
4. Tesla looks to cut lawyers’ award in Musk pay case from $5.2bn to $13.6mn
5. ‘The stupidest of stupid ideas’: Sunak’s D-Day snub sparks Tory outrage
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, June 8, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
